title: E250 What Is Bitcoin & How Does It Work? (w/ Andrei Jikh)
itunes:title: What Is Bitcoin & How Does It Work? (w/ Andrei Jikh)
description:
Bitcoin & financial guru, Andrei Jikh, joins the boys to explain the complex yet revolutionary system that is Cryptocurrency: What is a Bitcoin? How are they mined? What is the market cap and when will it stop growing? What about “Alt” coins, like Ethereum, Litecoin, or ALGO? + much more. PLUS... Andrei’s exclusive card tricks that he taught to the cast of Now You See Me 2...
